entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending early this evening then clearing. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon then snow and blowing snow. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 near noon. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow and blowing snow. Temperature rising to minus 6 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature rising to minus 6 by morning. Wind chill minus 23 in the evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 14 January 2023
